home.subtitle: Web Developer & Musician
home.description: Full-Stack web application developer, musician, trumpeter and pianist from the Canary Islands.

about.description: As a Full-Stack web application developer, I design and develop both the frontend and backend, providing comprehensive and satisfying solutions for my clients.

frontend.title: Front-End Development
frontend.description: Wishing to offer quality work to clients and companies.
frontend.task1: Building comprehensive web applications from concept to deployment.
frontend.task2: Crafting intuitive user interfaces for an optimal experience.
frontend.task3: Creating engaging interactions to optimize user satisfaction.
frontend.task4: Seamlessly incorporating your company's brand identity into the application.
frontend.task5: Designing visual representations to illustrate application functionality.

backend.title: Back-End Development
backend.description: Wishing to offer quality work to clients and companies.
backend.task1: Crafting the engine powering your web application.
backend.task2: Building robust backend systems to handle data processing and business logic.
backend.task3: Fine-tuning of backend systems for speed and efficiency.
backend.task4: Optimizing systems for scalability and performance to ensure smooth operation under heavy loads.
backend.task5: Implementing mechanisms to manage and resolve issues effectively, ensuring system reliability.

database.title: Database Development
database.description: Wishing to offer quality work to clients and companies.
database.task1: Designing data models that accurately represent the application's requirements and relationships.
database.task2: Creating structured and efficient database schemas to organize data effectively.
database.task3: Implementing indexing techniques to improve query performance and data retrieval.
database.task4: Analyzing and optimizing database queries to enhance overall system performance.
database.task5: Establishing robust backup and recovery procedures to ensure data integrity and continuity of operations.

title.iespc: Higher Degree Training Cycle, Web Application Development
